title: golang: code search - Indexing in progress - result may be inaccurate
body:
golang code searches fail.

For example: http://golang.org/search?q=read.

No results found for query "read"
Indexing in progress - result may be inaccurate 

The godoc command, run against a remote web server, fails.

$ godoc -q read
$ 

The godoc command, run against a locally hosted web server, succeeds.

$ godoc -server=:6060 -q read
QUERY
read

DID YOU MEAN
	Read

< . . . SNIP . . . >
